backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the NEXO AI backend with per-user conversation storage using nested Maps, supporting CRUD operations for conversations and messages with typed request categories.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the 'Founded by Abishek' attribution was implemented in ChatArea.tsx and Sidebar.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'NEXO AI' that mounts the React app via the root div and loads main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes Sidebar, ChatHeader, ChatArea, and InputBar into a full-screen layout with auto-selecting the latest conversation and a fixed caffeine.ai attribution footer.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat message display component that renders an empty-state welcome screen (with 'Founded by Abishek' credit and feature cards) or a scrollable list of MessageBubble components with cached media generation.
frontend/src/components/ChatHeader.tsx: Header bar displaying the current conversation title and message count, or a default NEXO AI label, along with an animated online status indicator.
frontend/src/components/InputBar.tsx: A chat input bar component supporting text, image, and video modes that sends user messages and simulates AI responses using the addMessage mutation.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble with support for text, image response, and video response content types, including RTL language detection and download actions.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: A collapsible sidebar that lists, creates, and deletes conversations, fetched via React Query hooks, with relative timestamp formatting.
A simple animated typing indicator component displaying three bouncing dots with a bot avatar, shown while the AI is generating a response.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, and identity state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on conversations and messages against the ICP backend actor, scoped to the current user's principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining the NEXO AI dark theme using OKLCH color tokens, Tailwind base/components/utilities layers, custom glass/glow utility classes, and scrollbar styling with Outfit and JetBrains Mono fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/detectLanguage.ts: Utility that detects the language of a text string using Unicode range heuristics, returning a language code, display name, and RTL flag.
frontend/src/utils/generatePlaceholderIm: Generates a deterministic 512x512 placeholder image as a PNG data URI using Canvas, with gradient backgrounds, decorative circles, grid lines, and prompt text overlay based on a hash of the input prompt.
frontend/src/utils/generatePlaceholderVi: Generates a deterministic animated SVG data URI for video placeholders, featuring animated glow orbs, particles, a play icon, and prompt text derived from a hash of the input string.
frontend/src/utils/generateSimulatedResp: Provides simulated AI response text and image/video captions in multiple languages, selected based on detected language of the user input for use in demo or fallback scenarios.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, NEXO brand colors, custom fonts (Outfit, JetBrains Mono), border radii, glow box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the NEXO AI project state including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features such as chat interface, image/video generation, multilingual support, and visual theming.
